channel.title: Jason Fried & David Heinemeier Hansson on Adrián Moreno Peña · Web & Mobile Developer, all-around coder

item.title: It doesn't have to be crazy at work
item.description: A guide for organizations on how to create a healthy and productive work culture. It rejects the “Silicon Valley” status quo and default ways of doing things, advocating for a more sane and people-centric approach.

item.title: Rework
item.description: A guide for entrepreneurs and small businesses on how to be more productive and efficient.
